quote: Stand in the ashes of a trillion dead souls and ask the ghosts if honor matters. The silence is your answer.
Life is all about resolve. Outcome is secondary. It is resolve that determines the value of your life.
attribution: Snake, Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots

quote: The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world.
Even in dark times, we cannot relinquish the things that make us human.
Power is not a means, it is an end. One does not establish a dictatorship to safeguard a revolution; one makes the revolution to establish the dictatorship.
In the end, what separates a man from a slave? Money? Power? No. A man chooses; a slave obeys.
Death is inevitable. Our fear of it makes us play safe, blocks out emotion. It's a losing game. Without passion, you're already dead.
attribution: Max Payne, Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne

quote: The ending isn't any more important than any of the moments leading to it.
I don't want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean... is the Pirate King!
attribution: Monkey D. Luffy, One Piece: Pirate Warriors

quote: Time passes, people move. Like a river's flow, it never ends. A childish mind will turn to noble ambition. Young love will become deep affection. The clear water's surface reflects growth.
attribution: Sheik, The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
